New Records: The Angels are suffering through their ninth straight losing season, a franchise record.
Key Match Events: The White Sox lost to the Angels 4-3 in 13 innings.
Andrew Vaughn of the White Sox hit a home run in the fourth inning.
The game ended in the 13th inning with a walk-off single by Jordyn Adams of the Angels.
Post-Match Reflections: Kurt Squire, a White Sox fan, expressed mixed feelings of relief and existential reflection after the game.
Gabriel Zepeda, a White Sox fan, hoped both teams would have better luck next year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The official attendance was 22,757, less than half of Angel Stadium's capacity.
Shohei Ohtani, who left the Angels to join the Dodgers, achieved the 50-50 milestone the next day.
